https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasAnno._instruction: Add all custom annotations which define this custom anatomical entity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasAnno.label: Has annotation
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasAnno.name: hasAnnotation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this custom anatomical entity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/related._instruction: Add the related anatomical entity as defined by the UBERON ontology.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/related.label: Related uberonterm
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/related.name: relatedUBERONTerm

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/relatio._instruction: Add all relations (qualitative or quantitative) of this custom anatomical entity to other anatomical entities.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/relatio.label: Relation assessment
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/relatio.name: relationAssessment
